item.title: A very cynical guide on how to think like a Bangladeshi:
item.description: Do not trust anyone or anything. Do not care about anything because of #1. Do not take any initiative unless your life is dependent on that, because of #2. Be comfortable with the status quo (no matter how painful is that), because of #3.
